"Brigitta": "This is the Forest area of Planet Naberius. It is characterized by lush greenery and various native species."
"It has a mild climate, and is considered low risk. Various ARKS missions have been carried out here."
"However, the Native Species of Naberius have started to become increasingly hostile due to the rising Darker presence. Do proceed with caution."
